title: Login Status: Did not recieve response from server
body: I keep getting this message when i try to log into league. Is the servers down or something? I'ts not letting me login. Can I get soem help form a rioter?

replies.body: I'm having the same problem now and can't figure it out.

I double-checked just to make sure and we aren't seeing any server wide issues with the Login Queue.  Given this, it sounds like something is blocking your computer from correctly talking to our Login Servers (hence the error name).  To be honest, I can't identify the specific reason why this could be occurring, but make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Login Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues).  It has the most common solutions that should resolve this error completely.

Reply back and let me know if you are still experiencing issues!
